EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-POST-FORUM.Email #4 Employers + BenCon (Overheard at Forum
EmailTemplate.subject: Overheard at Forum 2023: Generative AI, personalized care and more
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Each year at Forum, we bring together hundreds of visionaries from some of the most forward-thinking healthcare organizations to exchange best practices and to discuss what's next. This year was no exception – here is our latest drop of session content from this year’s event:
Jason Gorevic: Addressing today’s greatest healthcare challenges <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/jason-gorevic-addressing-todays-greatest-healthcare-challenges?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-POST-FORUM&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Teladoc Health CEO Jason Gorevic shares his perspective on the key ingredients needed to address today’s greatest healthcare challenges.
How personalized health journeys drive better outcomes <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/how-personalized-health-journeys-drive-better-outcomes?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-POST-FORUM&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Health is an individual journey. That’s why creating tailored systems is crucial for health plans and health systems, ensuring personalized paths lead to long-term outcomes. Gain insight as leaders from renowned health plans delve into their strategies to meet this need.
How AI helps clinicians and consumers reach health goals <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/how-ai-helps-clinicians-and-consumers-reach-health-goals?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-POST-FORUM&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Love it or hate it, AI cannot be ignored. Leaders across industries tackle the burning topic of generative AI, including it’s increasingly powerful capabilities, it’s role in healthcare and guidelines for responsible use. Ready for more on emerging digital health trends? Join Kelly Bliss, President of U.S. Group Health at Teladoc Health at the SHRM Benefit Trends virtual retreat <[[https://gateway.on24.com/wcc/eh/3511880/lp/4288789/exploring-benefits-trends-strategies-to-enhance-your-benefits-package-and-gain-a-competitive-edge%20?mkt_tok=MTM4LURSSC03MDcAAAGNfvfqi9F5bWo_4EJXlpDEB32ZQcqI6eoAbfU4TpcN3Yzz-TkxpihY_D5ZbOa3c-vmTAvN9oMh9EVdaB012Ts]]>on 8/17 to learn more about the value of embracing a virtual-first healthcare strategy. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
